Text:
Cheers for the up dude, you're the only one so far.

For reference, this is S08E01
@the_gray_mac  No this is S02E01.  That's what tvrage.com says. They separate American Chopper and American Chopper: Senior vs. Junior as two different series.

pupupeepee appreciate your uploads of Senior vs. Junior.
blackdragon13 is correct. Senior vs. Junior is classed as a different TV Program so to speak than American Chopper & this is S02E01
thanks for the up much appreciated
@blackdragonfly agreed this is S02 of Snr vs Jnr, but S01 was listed as S07 through TPB.

@pupupeepee
Thanks man, I'll take it. Seems like you're the only one so far. I have cable but I can never get the timing for the showtime and my ass on the couch to coincide.
pupupeepee, you rock! Thanks so much, we can't seem to get A.C. north of the 45th.
